column3: I came up out of the water
column4: Raised my hands up to the Father
column5: Gave it all to him that day
column6: Felt a new wind kiss my face
column8: Could finally see where I was going
column9: It didn't matter where I'd been
column10: I'm not the same man I was then
column19: And the pain wont go away
column28: I got a lot of Hey,, Im sorry's
column31: I wish that I could take it all back
column32: I just want to tell em that
column40: I'm even starting to forgive myself
column47: Here I am,, Here I am,, Here I am
